attributes.action: Train,and bus,journey's to be free,to boost tourism,straight away.
attributes.additional_details: Both U.K. people and tourist will benefits,is so many ways.People will get out more,so money will flow more.People's health,will benefit more,for getting out in the daylight,and enjoying life more,travelling,so less strain on the nhs,and police.This idea will benefit all people's mental health.Tourism,will multiply,four,five fold.U.K.,will be a buzz of new possibilities.U.K.People will have more money,more hope.Bills will be less,as more people will be in U.K.
attributes.background: I believe train and bus journey's should be free,to boost tourism.I believe that the ecomony will be boosted so much by this idea,that the idea will pay for it's self.Not only will tourist get the benefits from this idea,but so will the U.K. people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623220
